Class ImageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.towson.cosc431.valis.imageservice.ImageService

  • public class ImageService
extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getAvailableImageIds()
      Returns the list of available icon ids These are the only ids that can be used when calling setImage()
      java.util.List<Avatar> getAvatars()
      Returns the list of available Avatar objects (image id and icon id)
      android.graphics.Bitmap getImage(java.lang.String id)
      Returns the Bitmap of the iconId that is associated with the given id.
      static ImageService getInstance()
      Returns the Singleton instance of the ImageService
      void setImage(java.lang.String id, int imageId)
      Associates a String id with an imageId

      • getImage

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getImage(java.lang.String id)
        Returns the Bitmap of the iconId that is associated with the given id.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a Bitmap or null
